allow: Bash(for service in analyzer coordinator portfolio signal_aggregator trader)

Bash(docker exec roottrading-db-1 psql -U postgres -d trading -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records, MIN(time) as first_record, MAX(time) as last_record FROM analyzer_data WHERE symbol = ''AAVEUSDC'';")
Bash(docker exec roottrading-db-1 psql -U postgres -d trading -c "SELECT timeframe, COUNT(*) as count FROM analyzer_data WHERE symbol = ''AAVEUSDC'' GROUP BY timeframe ORDER BY timeframe;")

Bash(docker exec roottrading-db-1 psql -U postgres -d trading -c "SELECT time, timeframe, rsi_14, ema_12, ema_26, macd_line, bb_position, market_regime, signal_strength FROM analyzer_data WHERE symbol = ''AAVEUSDC'' AND timeframe = ''15m'' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 5;")

Bash(docker exec roottrading-db-1 psql -U postgres -d trading -c "SELECT time, timeframe, rsi_14, market_regime, regime_strength, signal_strength, trend_alignment, momentum_score FROM analyzer_data WHERE symbol = ''BTCUSDC'' AND timeframe = ''1h'' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 8;")
